Articles.Content: I would just like to quickly ask am I the only person who has noticed that struts are not manufactured by StrutCo? but kerlington that seems a little odd doesn't it.
Maybe StrutCo just likes using lots of them?
I believe that the description for StrutCo states that they sell the struts, bur Kerlington invented them. So they took credit for the Kerlington's strut design.

If you remember that Apple doesn't sell fruit it makes more sense...

No really, it is probably just a name, but I am sure you can feel free to speculate
